title: Loving Hut
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Asian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Individual family owned and operated. Serves vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages.
streetAddress: Street C-238 Q. 554 nú 11 Jardim América
